languages.text: Once per round reloading a plasma weapon gives you an additional attack with plasma weapons. This bonus is automatically triggered in the first round of combat.

traits.locale_text: Once per round reloading a plasma weapon gives you an additional attack with plasma weapons. This bonus is automatically triggered in the first round of combat.

languages.text: This character gains an additional attack with a plasma weapon in the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat and when reloading a plasma weapon for the first time each subsequent round.

traits.locale_text: This character gains an additional attack with a plasma weapon in the first round of combat and when reloading a plasma weapon for the first time in each subsequent round.

languages.text: このキャラクターは、戦闘の最初のラウンドと、以降の各ラウンドでプラズマ武器を初めてリロードしたときに、プラズマ武器で追加攻撃を行う。
languages.original_text: This character gains an additional attack with a plasma weapon in the first round of combat and when reloading a plasma weapon for the first time in each subsequent round.

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターは、戦闘の最初のラウンドと、以降の各ラウンドでプラズマ武器を初めてリロードしたときに、プラズマ武器で追加攻撃を行う。

languages.text: Этот персонаж получает дополнительную атаку плазменным оружием в первом {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g} боя и при первой перезарядке этого оружия в каждом последующем раунде.
languages.original_text: This character gains an additional attack with a plasma weapon in the first round of combat and when reloading a plasma weapon for the first time in each subsequent round.

traits.locale_text: Этот персонаж получает дополнительную атаку плазменным оружием в первом раунде боя и при первой перезарядке этого оружия в каждом последующем раунде.
Этот персонаж получает дополнительную атаку плазменным оружием в первом раунде боя и при первой перезарядке этого оружия в каждом последующем раунде.

languages.text: Dieser Charakter erhält in der ersten Kampf{g|Encyclopedia:Round}runde{/g} und beim erstmaligen Nachladen einer Plasmawaffe in jeder Folgerunde einen zusätzlichen Angriff mit einer Plasmawaffe.
languages.original_text: This character gains an additional attack with a plasma weapon in the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat and when reloading a plasma weapon for the first time each subsequent round.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Charakter erhält in der ersten Kampfrunde und beim erstmaligen Nachladen einer Plasmawaffe in jeder Folgerunde einen zusätzlichen Angriff mit einer Plasmawaffe.

languages.text: El personaje gana un ataque adicional con un arma de plasma en el primer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} del combate y la primera vez que recargue un arma de plasma en cada asalto subsiguiente.
languages.original_text: This character gains an additional attack with a plasma weapon in the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat and when reloading a plasma weapon for the first time each subsequent round.

traits.locale_text: El personaje gana un ataque adicional con un arma de plasma en el primer asalto del combate y la primera vez que recargue un arma de plasma en cada asalto subsiguiente.

languages.text: 此角色在战斗首{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}期间，以及接下来每轮中首次装填等离子武器时，使用等离子武器攻击时获得一次额外攻击。
languages.original_text: This character gains an additional attack with a plasma weapon in the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat and when reloading a plasma weapon for the first time each subsequent round.

traits.locale_text: 此角色在战斗首轮期间，以及接下来每轮中首次装填等离子武器时，使用等离子武器攻击时获得一次额外攻击。

languages.text: Le personnage gagne une attaque supplémentaire avec une arme à plasma lors du premier {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} de combat et lorsqu'il recharge une arme à plasma pour la première fois à chacun des rounds suivants.
languages.original_text: This character gains an additional attack with a plasma weapon in the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat and when reloading a plasma weapon for the first time each subsequent round.

traits.locale_text: Le personnage gagne une attaque supplémentaire avec une arme à plasma lors du premier round de combat et lorsqu'il recharge une arme à plasma pour la première fois à chacun des rounds suivants.

languages.text: Bu karakter, çatışmanın ilk {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raundunda{/g} ve sonraki her rauntta ilk kez bir plazma silahını doldurduğunda plazma silahıyla ilave bir saldırı kazanır.
languages.original_text: This character gains an additional attack with a plasma weapon in the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat and when reloading a plasma weapon for the first time each subsequent round.

traits.locale_text: Bu karakter, çatışmanın ilk raundunda ve sonraki her rauntta ilk kez bir plazma silahını doldurduğunda plazma silahıyla ilave bir saldırı kazanır.
